argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | estrcbasbas.c | |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | estrcbasbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | estrcbasbas.u | |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_estrcbas | |- ( ph -> U = ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( ph -> B = U ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( E e. B <-> E e. U ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-base | |- Base = Slot 1 |
| 8 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( U e. WUni /\ E e. U ) -> U e. WUni ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( U e. WUni /\ E e. U ) -> E e. U ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_wunstr | |- ( ( U e. WUni /\ E e. U ) -> ( Base ` E ) e. U ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ex | |- ( U e. WUni -> ( E e. U -> ( Base ` E ) e. U ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( E e. U -> ( Base ` E ) e. U ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ph -> ( E e. B -> ( Base ` E ) e. U ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ph /\ E e. B ) -> ( Base ` E ) e. U ) |
